trends: There have been 15 other sightings in Fairfield
There were no other sightings in Fairfield on or around August 21st 2009
Summary: Extremely bright, shiney white. Moving NE at high velocity over I-80 E.
divs: Sighting DetailsNoticed movemen in sky while driving home on I-80 E between American Canyon and Fairfield, CA. Looked up and saw shiney disc flying at high speed over power lines on south side of freeway. Visually followed disc as it crossed over the freeway heading north east. Looked around and saw other people watching and pointing at it, too. I hurried to take the Green Valley exit to make it home and grab my binoculars. Last seen heading towards Vacaville area. I ran back outside with binoculars, but it had gone over the hills and was out of sight. Simply amazing and so exciting to see! Incidentally, a sceptic might claim it to be an airplane shining in the sun - coming from the West - behind me. I got a clear look at it, however, and saw it to be disc shaped and moving at a velocity no fighter could have matched. I'm retired USAF and know a plane when I see one. There is a lot of air traffic nearby, but this was unlike anything akin to a plane... wrong shape, shiney white, and moving incredibly fast.
